div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 6 Cyclades ?, c. 1889 (289) Burial: c. 500 B.C. (T) Contents: 145+ AR Aegina: 114 st. (incl. at least 1 Pseudaeg., Brett 1280) Andros or Ceos: 4 st. Paros: 2 st. Siphnos: 4 st. Thera? : 11 st. Dardanus? : 1 st. (cock obv., cf. BMC p. xlii) Miletus? : 2 st. Chios: 3 st. Cos: 4 st. unidentified coins of smaller denominations Disposition: Boston 7 (Brett 1107-8, 1280, 1291, 1294, 1296, 2013); Montagu 1 (NC 1892, pl. 3.1-either from this hoard or from Santorin, no. 7 below) Greenwell, NC 1890, pp. 13-9, illus.
